title: Cirkuše, Litija
text: Cirkuše (; in older sources also "Cerkovišče", ) is a small settlement south of <a href="Va%C4%8De">Vače</a> in the <a href="Municipality%20of%20Litija">Municipality of Litija</a> in central <a href="Slovenia">Slovenia</a>. The area is part of the traditional region of <a href="Upper%20Carniola">Upper Carniola</a>. It is now included with the rest of the municipality in the <a href="Central%20Sava%20Statistical%20Region">Central Sava Statistical Region</a>; until January 2014 the municipality was part of the <a href="Central%20Slovenia%20Statistical%20Region">Central Slovenia Statistical Region</a>.
